V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_2a_0: taṃ prātimokṣaṃ bhavaduḥkhamokṣaṃ śruttvānudhīrāḥ sugatasya bhāṣitāṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_3a_0: cirasya labdhvā ratanāni trīṇi buddho yodaṃ māyikāñca śuddhāṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_4a_0: śīlena yukto śramaṇo tireti śīlena yukto brāhmaṇo tireti /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_4a_1: śīlena yukto naradevapūjyo śīlena yuktasya hi prātimokṣaṃ //
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_5a_0: aneka buddhānumataṃ viśuddhaṃ śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhā dharaṇīvasāntaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_2_0: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te sāvadyaśīlacaritrāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_2_2: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te anavadyaśīlacāritrāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_3_2: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ larjjinām bhinnavṛttaśīlānāṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_4_0: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te duḥśī layāya karmmāntāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_4_2: kāryañca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te tedhātuke atra prajñiptāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_5_0: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ṣaḍindriyaṃ ye hi arakṣitaṃ nityaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_5_2: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ṣaḍindriyaṃ ye hi surakṣitaṃ nityaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_6_0: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ mātmaśīle hi ye svayaṃ vadanti /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_6_2: kāryañca poṣadhena teṣāṃ śīle hi nāsti gārhyaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_7_0: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ virāgitaṃ śāstu śāsanaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_7_1: ye hi āsevitā ca ye hi vipattīyo pañca cāpattīḥ //
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_7_2: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ yuktānāṃ śāsane daśabalasya /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_7_3: saṃbuddhasya sarvvadarśinyo maitrīpadā ye hi paricīrṇṇāḥ //
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_8_0: yeṣāṃ ca vasati hṛdaye śāstā dharmmo gaṇottamo /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_8_1: śikṣā uddeśo samvāso saṃtoṣo śāstuno vacanam //
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_8_2: teṣām poṣadho adya parityaktāni ye hi etāni /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_9_0: śuddhasya vai sadā hastaḥ sadā śuddhasya poṣadho /
V01bsu046_u:5_0: vastu-atikrāntāḥ suvihitāḥ śuddhanipuṇā antasamāpanno upaniṣaṇṇāḥ cāritrāḥ śalākāgaṇitā bhikṣuṇīmāprāptā ettarkajanāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:5_2: ārocitañca prativedetha-ko bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīnāṃ chandahārako nāsti cātra kaścidanupasaṃpannā nāsti uṣṇiyukto nāsti mātṛghātī nāsti pitṛghātī nāsti arhantaghātako /
V01bsu046_u:5_3: nāsti saṃghabhedako / nāsti tathāgatasya duṣtacittarudhiro khādake /
V01bsu046_u:5_4: nāsti bhikṣuṇī dūṣako / nāsti stainyasamvāsiko / nāsti nānāsamvāsiko nāsti asamvāsiko /
V01bsu046_u:5_6: tadevaṃ samanvāharanta bhagavato śrāvakāṇāṃ nityaviśuddhānāṃ pariśuddhaśilānāṃ /
V01bsu046_u:5_7: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho adya saṃghasya cāturddaśiko vā sandhipoṣadho vā viśuddhinakṣatraṃ /
V01bsu046_u:5_8: ettakaṃ rāttasya niggataṃ / ettamavaśiṣṭaṃ / kiṃ saṃghasya pūrvvakṛtyaṃ / alpakṛtyo bhagavataḥ śrāvako saṃgho so bhavati /
V01bsu046_u:5_9_0: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho adya saṃghasya pāñcadaśiko poṣadho viśuddhinakṣatraṃ yadi
V01bsu046_u:5_9_1: saṃghasya prāptākālaṃ saṃgho imasmin pṛthivīpradeśe yavatakaṃ bhikṣusaṃghenābhigṛhītaṃ
V01bsu046_u:5_9_2: samantanavyāmamātraṃ atrāntare pāñcadaśikaṃ poṣadhaṃ kuryātprātimokṣaṃ ca sūtramuddiśeyyā,
V01bsu046_u:6_0_0: kariṣyate bhante saṃgho imasmin pṛthivīpradeśe yāvatakaṃ bhikṣusaṃghenābhigṛhītaṃ
V01bsu046_u:6_0_1: samantana vyāmamātramatrāntare pāñcadaśikaṃ poṣadhaṃ prātimokṣaṃ ca sūtramuddiśiṣyati /
V01bsu046_u:6_2: abhimukhaṃ kṣāmati jarāmaraṇaṃ kṣīyati jīvate priyaṃ hāyati saddharmmā astameti /
V01bsu046_u:6_9: tatkasya hetoḥ / apramādādhigatānāṃ hi tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksambuddhānāṃ vaidhiḥ /
V01bsu046_u:6_16: durmatkuṇnāṃ pudgalānānnigrahāya peśalānāñca bhikṣuṇā phāsu vihārāya /
V01bsu046_u:6_17: aprasannānāṃ pramādāya / prasannānāñca trayobhāvāya dṛṣṭadhārmikāṇāmāśravāṇāṃ nirghātāya samparāyikāṇāmāśravāṇāmāpatyāmananuśravaṇatāya /
V01bsu046_u:6_18: yathemaṃ syātpra vacanaṃ virakṣitikaṃ vā bhujanyaṃvivṛtaṃ suprakāśitaṃ yāvandevamanuṣyeṣviti /
V01bsu046_u:7_1: tāṃ śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta bhāṣiṣyāmi /
V01bsu046_u:7_4: tūṣṇīmbhāvena / kho punarāyuṣmanto pariśuddha iti vedayiṣyāmi yathā kho punarāyuṣmanto pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ pṛcchitasya bhikṣusya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati /
V01bsu046_u:7_5: evameva mevaṃ rūpāye bhikṣuparyāye yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanuśrāvayiṣyati /
V01bsu046_u:7_6: yo punabhikṣu evaṃ rūpāye bhikṣuparyāye yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanuśrāviyamāṇo smaramāṇo santī māpattīnnāviṣkaroti /
V01bsu046_u:7_8: saṃprajānamṛṣāvādo kho punarāyuṣmanto antarāyiko dhammo ukto bhagavatā /
V01bsu046_u:7_9: tasmātsmaramāṇena bhikṣuṇa āpanne viśuddhi prekṣeṇa santī āpattī āviṣkarttavyā /
V01bsu046_u:7_10: āviṣkṛtvā ca me phāsu bhavati no anāviṣkṛtvā /
V01bsu046_u:9_0: ime kho punarāyuṣmanto catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā anvarddhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśamāgacchanti /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.1_0: yo punabhikṣu bhikṣuṇā śikṣā sāmīcīsamāpanno śikṣāmāpratyākhyāya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.1_1: daurvvalyamanāviṣkṛtvā maithunaṃ grāmyadharmmaṃ pratiṣeveya antamaśato tiryagyonigatāyamapi
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.1_2: sārddhamayaṃ bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavatyasaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣu hi sārddha saṃvāsaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:11_0_0: PrMoSū(Mā)_idaṃ bhagavatā veśālīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ pañcavarṣābhisaṃbuddhena
V01bsu046_u:11_0_1: hemante pakṣe pañcame divase dvādaśame pūre bhuktamuttarāmukhaniṣaṇṇena dvyarddhapauruṣāyāṃcchāyāyāṃ
V01bsu046_u:11_0_2: āyuṣmantaṃ yaśikakalandakaputramārabhya imasya ca śikṣāpadasya prajñaptirdharmo yathā
V01bsu046_u:11_0_3: praṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayamucyate anudharmo /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.2_0: yo punabhikṣū grāmādvā araṇyādvā adinnamanyātakaṃ stainyasaṃskāramādiyeya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.2_1: yathārūpeṇādinnādānena jāno gṛhītvā hanyemvā vadhemvā pravrājemvā hambho puruṣa corosi
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.2_2: bālosi mūḍhosi stainyosīti vā vadem tathārūpaṃ bhikṣūradinnamādeyamāno ayame bhikṣūḥ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.2_3: pārājiko bhavatyasamvāsyo na labhate bhikṣū hi sārddhasaṃvāsaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:13_0: PrMoSū(Mā)_idaṃ bhagavatā rājagṛhe śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisambuddhena hemante pakṣe dvitīvase navame paścādbhuktaṃ purastānmukhaniṣaṇṇena /
V01bsu046_u:13_1: arddhatīyapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyāmāyuṣmantaṃ dhanikaṃ kuṃbhakārajātiyamārabhya rājānañca śreṇīyaṃ bimbasāraṃ pāṃsukulikaṃ ca bhikṣu /
V01bsu046_u:13_2: imasya ca śikṣāpadasya prajñaptirdharmo yathā praṇihitasya ca yā anuvarttanatā ayamucyate anudharmo /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.3_0: yo punabhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ manuṣyavigrahaṃ jīvitād vyāparopeya śastrahārakaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.3_1: vāsya paryeyeya maraṇāya cainaṃ samādāpeya maraṇāvaṇṇaṃ vāsya saṃvaṇṇeya hambho puruṣa
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.3_2: kinte iminā pāpakena durjjīvitena viśjīvitena mṛtante jīvitācchreyo iti cittamalaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.3_3: cittasaṃkalpamanekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya cainaṃ samādāpeya maraṇavaṇṇavāsya saṃvaṇṇeya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.3_4: so ca puruṣo tenopakrameṇa kālaṃ kuryānnānyena ayaṃ pi bhikṣūḥ pārājiko bhavatyasaṃvāsyo
V01bsu046_u:15_0_0: PrMoSū(Mā)_idaṃ bhagavatā veśālīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣo'bhisaṃmbuddhena hemante pakṣe
V01bsu046_u:15_0_1: tṛtīye divase daśame paścād bhuktaṃ purastābhimukhāniṣaṇṇena arddhatṛtīyena pauruṣāyāṃcchāyāyāṃ
V01bsu046_u:15_0_2: sambahulāna gilānopasthāpakān bhikṣūnārabhya mṛgadaṇḍikaṃ ca parivrajakamimasya ca
V01bsu046_u:15_0_3: śikṣāpadasya prajñaptirddharmo yathā praṇihitasya ca yā anuvarttanatā ayamucyate
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.4_1: ayaṃ pi bhikṣūḥ dharmmamalamāryajñānadaśanaṃ viśeṣādhiśeṣādhigama pratijāneya iti jānāmi iti paśyāmīti /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.4_3: vā a[sa] manugrāhiyamāṇo vā āpanno viśuddhiprokṣo evamavaci /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.4_5: ayaṃ pi paśyāmīti iti tucchaṃ mṛṣāvilāpamanyatrābhimānāt /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_par.4_6: ayaṃ pi bhikṣūḥ pārājiko bhavatyasaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣūhi sārddhaṃsaṃ [vāsaṃ] /
V01bsu046_u:17_0_0: PrMoSū(Mā)_idaṃ bhagavatā śrāvastīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisaṃbuddhena hemante pakṣe
V01bsu046_u:17_0_1: catuththe divase trayodaśame pūre bhuktaṃ uttarāmu khaniṣaṇṇena arddhantha pauruṣāyāṃcchāyāyāṃ
V01bsu046_u:17_0_2: sambahulān grāmavāsikā bhikṣunārabhya ābhimānikaṃ ca bhikṣu imasya ca śikṣāpadasya
V01bsu046_u:17_0_3: prajñaptirddharmo yathāpraṇihitasya ca yā anuvarttanatā ayamucyate anudharmo /
V01bsu046_u:18_0: udyānaṃ // [1] maithunaṃ [2] adinnādānaṃ [3] vadho manuṣyavigrahaṃ [4] syātkṛtena cottarimanuṣyadharma pratijānatīti /
V01bsu046_u:19_0: uddiṣtāḥ // kho punarāyuṣmano catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:19_1: yeṣāṃ bhikṣuritonyatarāmāpattimāpadyetvā pārājiko bhavatyasamvāsyo na labhate hi bhikṣuhi sārddhasaṃvāsaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:19_2: yathāpūrvve tathā paścādyathāpaścāttathā pūrvve pārājiko bhavatyasamvāsyo na labhate bhikṣu hi [sārdhaṃ] saṃvāsaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:19_4: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāstṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ pariśuddhātrāyuṣmanto yasmāttūṣṇīmeva metaṃ dhārayāmi /
V01bsu046_u:21_0: ime punarāyuṣmanto trayodaśa saṃghātiśeṣā dharmā anvaddharmāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddheśamāgacchanti /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.1: saṃcetanikā ye śukrasya viśṛṣtīye anyatra svapnāntareṃ saṃghātiśeṣo /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.2_0: yo punabhikṣu otīṇṇā vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ kāyasaṃsaṃggaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.2_1: samāpadyeya saṃyathīdaṃ hastagrahaṇaṃ vā veṇīgrahaṇamvā anyatarānyatarasya vā punaraṅgajātasya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.3: yo punabhikṣu otīṇṇā viparītena cittena mātṛgrāmaṃ dusthūlāya vācāya obhāṣeya pāpikāya maithunāya saṃvītāya saṃyathīdaṃ yuvāṃ yuvāṃ yuvatīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.4_0: yo punabhikṣu otīṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmasya antike ātmikāye
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.4_1: paricaryāye vaṇṇaṃ bhāṣeya etadagraṃ bhagini paricaryāṇāṃ yā mādṛśaṃ śramaṇaṃ śīlavantaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.4_2: kalyāṇadharmaṃ brahmacāriṃ etena dharmeṇa upasthiheya paricareya yaduta maithunopasaṃhiteneti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.5_0: yo punabhikṣuḥ saṃcaritraṃ samāpadyeya striyāye vā puruṣasyopasaṃhareya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.5_1: puruṣyasya vā sataṃ striyāye upasaṃhareya jāyattanena vā jārttanena vā antamasato
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.6_0: svayaṃ cāyikāya bhikṣuṇā kuṭī kārāpayamāṇena asvābhikātmoddeśikāṃ kuṭīkārāpayitavyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.6_2: tiryaka saptāntaraṃ bhikṣu cānonābhinetavyā vastudeśanāya te hi bhikṣu hi vastu deśayitavyaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.6_3: anārambhāṃ saparikramaṇaṃ sārambhe ce bhikṣu vastusminnaparikramaṇe svayaṃ yācikāya kuṭīṃ kārāpeyaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.6_5: pramāṇaṃ vā atikrameya adeśite vastusminnaparikramaṇe saṃghātiśeṣo /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.7_0: mahālakaṃ bhikṣuṇā vihāraṃ [kārā] pathamāṇena sasvāmikakātmoddeśikaṃ bhikṣuvānenābhinetavyā vastudeśanāya te hi bhikṣū hi vastu deśayitavyaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.7_1: anārambhaḥ saparikramaṇaṃ sārambhe ce bhikṣūṃ vastusminnaparikramaṇaṃ mahallakaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.7_2: vihāraṃ kārāpeya sasvāmikamātmoddeśikaṃ bhikṣunvā nābhineya vastudeśanā ya adeśite
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.8_0: yo punabhikṣū bhikṣusya duṣto doṣātkupito anāttamano śuddhaṃ bhikṣūmanāpatikamamūlakena
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.8_1: pārājikena dharmeṇa anudhvaṃseya appeva nāma imaṃ bhikṣūṃ brahmacaryāto cyāveyanti /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.8_2: so tadapareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asamanugrāhiyamāṇo vā amūlakameva tamadhikaraṇaṃ bhavati /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.8_3: amūlakasya ca adhikaraṇasya ca adharmo upādinno bhavati /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.9_0: yo punabhikṣū bhikṣusya duṣto doṣātkupito anāttamano anyabhāgīyasyādhikaraṇasya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.9_1: kiñcideva lesāmātrakaṃ dharmamupādāya aparājikaṃ bhikṣūṃ parājikeṇa dharmeṇa anudhvaṃseya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.9_2: appeva nāma imaṃ bhikṣuṃ brahmacaryāto cyāveyanti /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.9_3: so tadapareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asamanugrāhiyamāṇo vā anyabhāgīyameva tamadhikaraṇaṃ bhavati /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.9_4: anyabhāgīyasya cādhikaraṇasya keci [deva] lesāmātrako dharmo upādinno bhavati /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.9_5: bhikṣu ca doṣe pratiṣṭhahati doṣādavacāmīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.10_0: yo punabhikṣuḥ samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya bhedanasamvarttanīyamvā'dhikaraṇaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.10_1: samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya so bhikṣu bhikṣuhi evamasya vacanīyo mā āyuṣman samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākramehi /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.10_2: bhedana samvarttanīyamvā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhāhi /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.10_3: sametta āyuṣmānsārddhaṃ saṃghena samagrohi saṃgho sahito sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeśo kṣīrodakī bhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāno sukhaṃ ca phāsuñca viharati /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.10_4: evaṃ ca sa bhikṣū bhikṣū hi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.10_5: so ca pratinissareya so bhikṣū bhikṣū hi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissaggāya yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo vā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.10_6: taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ no ca pratinissareya tameva vastusamādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya saṃghātiśeṣo /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.11_1: eko vā dvau vā trayo vā sambahulā vā vagavādakā anuvattakāḥ samanuṣyāḥ saṃghabhedāya te bhikṣū tānbhikṣūnevaṃ vadeyya mā āyuṣmanto etaṃ bhikṣuṃ kiñcidvadatha /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.11_2: kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakamvā / dharmmavādī caiṣo bhikṣū vinayavādī caiṣo bhikṣū asmākaṃ caiṣo bhikṣūcchandañca rūciñca samādāya pragṛhya vyavaharati /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.11_3: ya caitasya bhikṣūsya kṣamate ca rocate ca asmākamapi taṃ kṣamate ca rocate ca jānan caiṣo bhikṣu bhāṣate no ajānan /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.11_4: te bhikṣū bhikṣū hi evamasya vacanīyā māyuṣmanto evaṃ vadatha na eṣo bhikṣū dharmavādī
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.11_5: na eṣo bhikṣū vinayavādī adharmavādī caiṣo bhikṣū avinayavādī caiṣo bhikṣū ajānan
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.11_7: mā āyuṣmanto saṃghabhedaṃ rocenta saṃghasāmagrīmevāyuṣmanto rocanta /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.11_8: samenta āyuṣmanto sārdhaṃ saṃghena samagro hi saṃgho sahito sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeśo kṣīrodakī bhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāno sukhaṃ ca phāsuṃ ca viharati /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.11_9: evañca te bhikṣu bhikṣuhi vucyamānāstamvastuṃ pratinissarea ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ no ca pratinissarea te bhikṣū bhikṣū hi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyāḥ samanubhāṣitavyāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.11_10: tasya vastusya pratinissaggāya yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.11_11: vā tamvastuṃ pratinissarea itaṃ kuśalaṃ no ca pratinissareṃsu tameva ca vastuṃ samādāya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.12_0: bhikṣuḥ kho punadūrvvacakajātīyo bhoti so uddeśaparyāpanne hi śikṣāpade hi bhikṣu hi śikṣāyāṃ sahadharmeṇa sahavinayena vucya māno ātmānamavacanīyaṃ karoti /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.12_1: so evamāha / mā māṃ āyuṣmanto kiñcidvadatha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.12_3: kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā viramanvāyuṣmanto mama vacanāya /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.12_4: so bhikṣū bhikṣū hi evamasya vacanīyo mā āyuṣmannuddeśaparyāpanne hi śikṣāpade hi
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.12_5: bhikṣū hi śikṣāyāṃ sahadharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamāno ātmānamavacanīyaṃ karo hi
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.12_6: vacanīyam vāyuṣmānātmānaṃ karottu bhikṣu pi āyuṣmantamvakṣanti śikṣāyāṃ sahadharmeṇa
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.12_7: sahavina [yena] āyuṣmānapi bhikṣūnvadantu śikṣayā sahadharmeṇa sahavinayena /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.12_8: evaṃ samvaddhā kho punastasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyak sambuddhasya yathā yadidamasya manyasya vacanīyā anyo nyāpatti vyutthāpanīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.12_9: evaṃ ca so bhikṣū bhikṣū hi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ no
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.12_10: ca pratinissareya so bhikṣū bhikṣū hi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.12_11: tasya vastusya pratinissaggāya yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vābhivastuṃ pratinissareya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sa.12_12: ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ no ca pratinissareya tameva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya saṃghātiśeṣo /
V01bsu046_u:34_0: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA bhikṣu kho punaranyataraṃ grāmamvā nagaramvā nigamamvā upaniśrāya viharanti /
V01bsu046_u:34_1: kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāsteṣānte pāpakāḥ samācārā dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca kulānyapi duṣtāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca kuladūṣakāśca punarbhavanti /
V01bsu046_u:34_2: pāpasamācārāḥ te bhikṣū bhikṣū hi evamasya va canīyāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:34_3: āyuṣmantānāṃ khalu pāpakāḥ samācārāḥ dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca kulānyapi duṣtāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V01bsu046_u:34_4: kuladūṣakāśca punarāyuṣmantaḥ pāpasamācārāḥ prakramanvāyuṣmanto imasmādāvāsādalamvā iha vāseneti /
V01bsu046_u:34_5_0: evaṃ ca te bhikṣū bhikṣū hi vucyamānāste bhikṣū tānbhikṣune vadea cchandagāmī cāyuṣmānto
V01bsu046_u:34_5_1: saṃgho doṣagāmī cāyuṣmanto saṃgho mohagāmī cāyuṣmanto saṃgho bhayagāmī cāyuṣmanto
V01bsu046_u:34_5_2: saṃgho saṃgho ca tāhi tādṛśikāhi āpattīhi /
V01bsu046_u:34_6: ekatyān bhikṣūn pravrājeti ekatyānbhikṣunna pravrājeti te bhikṣū bhikṣū hi evaṃmasya vacanīyāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:34_7: mā āyuṣmanto evaṃ vada na ca bhikṣū na saṃgho cchandagāmī /
V01bsu046_u:34_8: na saṃgho doṣagāmī na saṃgho mohagāmī /
V01bsu046_u:34_9: na saṃgho bhayagāmī / na ca saṃgho tāhi tādṛśikāhi āpattīhi /
V01bsu046_u:34_11_0: āyuṣmantānāmeva khalamāpakaḥ samācārā dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca kulānyapi duṣtāni dṛśyante
V01bsu046_u:34_11_1: ca śrūyante ca kuladūṣakāśca punarāyuṣmantaḥ grāmasamācārāḥ prakramanvāyuṣmanto imasmādāvāsādalamvā
V01bsu046_u:34_11_2: iha vāseneti evaṃ ca bhikṣū bhikṣū hi vucyamānābhivastupratinissarea ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ
V01bsu046_u:34_11_3: no ca pratinissarea te bhikṣū bhikṣū hi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyāstasya
V01bsu046_u:34_11_4: vastusya pratinissaggāya yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā
V01bsu046_u:34_11_5: taṃ vastuṃ pratinissarea ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ no ca pratinissarea ime ca vastuṃ samādāya
V01bsu046_u:35_0_0: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA // uddānaṃ // [1] saṃcetanikā [2] hastagraho [3] obhāṣo [4] paricaryāvvaṇanaṃ
V01bsu046_u:35_0_1: [[5] saṃcaritraṃ [6-7] kuṭīvihārodve cā dūtena saṃghasya ca [10] bhedāyopakrāmati
V01bsu046_u:36_0_0: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA // uddiṣtāḥ // kho punarāyuṣmanto trayodaśasaṃghātiśeṣo dharmāstatra
V01bsu046_u:36_0_1: nava prathamāpattikāścatvāro yāvantṛtīyakā yeṣāṃ bhikṣu anyatarāmāpattimāpatitvā
V01bsu046_u:36_0_2: yāvantakaṃ jānan[prati] cchādeti tāvantakaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā akāmaparivāsaṃ parivasitavyaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:36_1: parivuttha parivāsena bhikṣuṇā uttariṃ ṣaḍāhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghe mānatvaṃ caritavyaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:36_2: ciṇṇamānatve bhikṣūḥ kṛtānudharmo āhūyana prativedyeya asyā viṃśatigaṇo bhikṣū saṃgho tatra so bhikṣu āmreyitavyo /
V01bsu046_u:36_3: eka bhikṣuṇāpi vodūno viṃśatigaṇo bhikṣusaṃgho taṃ bhikṣumāmreya so ca bhikṣū anābhṛto te ca bhikṣū gārhyāḥ iyamatra sāmīcī /
V01bsu046_u:37_0_0: PrMoSū(Mā)_SA tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto
V01bsu046_u:37_0_1: pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ tṛtīyamapi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ
V01bsu046_u:39_0: PrMoSū(Mā)_Aniy.ime kho punarāyuṣmanto duve aniyatā dharmā anvarddhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśamāgacchanti /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_aniy.1_0: yo punabhikṣu mātugrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ praticchannāsane alaṅkarmāṇīye
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_aniy.1_1: ekoyaraho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya tamena śraddheya vacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_aniy.1_2: manyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa vādeya pārāji kena vā saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_aniy.1_3: niṣadyo bhikṣuḥ pratijānāmāno trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmanyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_aniy.1_4: pārājikena vā saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā yena yena vā punarasya średdeya vacasā
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_aniy.1_5: upāsikā dṛṣṭvā dharmeṇa vadeya tena so bhikṣū dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo ayaṃ dharmo aniyato /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_aniy.2_1: nālaṃkarmaṇīyaṃ alaṃ kho puna mātṛgrāmaṃ dusthūlāya vācāya obhāsituṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_aniy.2_2: pāpikāya maithunopasaṃhitāya tathārūpeca bhikṣū āsane mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃmeko ekāya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_aniy.2_3: raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya tamenaṃ śraddheya vacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvādvinnāndharmāṇāṃ manyatarānyatareṇa
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_aniy.2_5: / pācatti kena vā niṣadyāsbhikṣuḥ pratijānamāno dvinnāndharmāṇāmanyatarāntareṇa dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_aniy.2_6: saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā / pācattikena vā / yena yena vā punarasya śraddheya vacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā dharmeṇa vadeya tena tena so bhikṣū dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo ayaṃ pi dharmo aniyato /
V01bsu046_u:43_0_0: PrMoSū(Mā)_Aniy.uddiṣtāḥ // kho punarāyuṣmanto duve aniyatā dharmā statrāyuṣmanto
V01bsu046_u:43_0_1: pracchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ dvitīyampi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāstutīyampi
V01bsu046_u:43_0_2: āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ pariśuddhāḥ atrāyuṣmanto yasmāttūṣṇīmevametaṃ
V01bsu046_u:44_0: IV. THE THIRTY NIHSARGIKA PACATTIKA DHARMAS.
V01bsu046_u:45_0: ime kho punarāyuṣmanto triṃśannissargiṃka pācattikā dharmā anvarddhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśamāgacchanti /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.1_0: kṛtacīvare hi bhikṣū hi uddhṛtasminkaṭhine daśāhaparamaṃ bhikṣuṇā atirekacīvarandhārayitavyaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.2: kṛtacīvare hi bhikṣū hi uddhṛtasminkaṭhine ekarātraṃ pi cetbhikṣu trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇāṃ manyatarānyatareṇa vipravaseya anyatra saṃghasamutīye nissargika pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.3_0: kṛtacīvare bhikṣu hi uddhṛtasminkaṭhine utpadyeya bhikṣusya akālacīvaramākāṃkṣamāṇena
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.3_1: bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhṇitavyaṃ pratigṛhṇītvā kṣipra meva taṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.3_2: kārāpayato ca tasya bhikṣūsya taṃ cīvaraṃ na paripūreya māsa paramantena bhikṣuṇā taṃ cīvaraṃ nikṣipitavyaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.3_3: ūnasya pāripūrīye santīye pratyāśāye taduttarinnikṣipeya santīye vā a santīye vā pratyāśāye nissargika pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.4: yo punabhikṣūranyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇeya anyatra parivarttakena nissargika pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.5: yo punabhikṣuranyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye purāṇacīvaradhovāyeya vā raṃjasyeya vā ākothopeya vā nissargika pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.6_0: yo punabhikṣuranyātakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vā gṛhapatiputraṃ vā cīvaraṃ yāceya anyatrasamaye nissargika pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.6_1: tatrāyaṃ samayo acchinnacīvaro bhikṣūṃ bhavati / ayamatrasamayo /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.7_0: acchinnacīvareṇa bhikṣuṇā kṣamate anyātakaṃ gṛhapatimvā gṛhapatiputraṃ vā cīvaraṃ yācituṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.7_1: tamenamabhibhāṣto sammato saṃbahule hi cīvare hi pravāreya tathā pravāritena bhikṣuṇā santarottaraparamaṃ cīvaraṃ sādayitavyaṃ taduttariṃ sādiyeya nissargika pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.8_0: bhikṣuṃ kho punaruddiśya anyatareṣāṃ dvinnāṃ gṛhipatikānāṃ cīvare
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.8_1: cetāpanānyaḥ anyāni upasaṃskṛtāni bhavanti pratisaṃcetayitāni ime hi vayaṃ cīvaracetāpane
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.8_2: hi civaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthannāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ cīvareṇācchādayiṣyāmaḥ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.8_3: tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvve apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpamāpadyeya sādhu kho puna
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.8_4: yūyaṃ māyuṣmanto ime hi cīvaracetāpane hi cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃ nāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.8_6: evaṃrūpeṇa ca ubhau pi sahitau ekena kalyāṇakāmatāmupādāya pratiniṣpanne cīvare nisarggika pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.9_0: bhikṣuṃ kho punaruddiśya anyatareṣāṃ dvinnāṃ gṛhapatikasya gṛhapatinīye
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.9_1: ca pratyeka cīvaracetāpanāni pratisaṃskṛtāni bhavanti pratisaṃcetāpitāni ime hi vayaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.9_2: pratyeka cīvaracetāpane hi pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃ nāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.9_4: tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvva apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpamāpadyeya sādhu kho punastamāyuṣman
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.9_5: tvaṃ ca bhagini ime hi pratyeka cīvara cetāpanehi pratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā ityaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.9_7: evaṃ rūpeṇa vā evaṃ rūpeṇa vā ubhau pi sahitau /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.9_8: ekena kalyāṇakāmatāmupādāya pratiniṣpanne cīvare nissargika pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.10_0: bhikṣu kho punaruddiśya anyataro rājā vā rājabhogyo vā dūtena cīvarace
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.10_1: tāpanāni preṣeya so bhikṣustenopasaṃkramitvā taṃ bhikṣumevaṃ vadeya imāni khalvāryamuddiśya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_np.10_2: itthannāmena rājñā ca rājabhojyena vā dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni tāni āryo pratigṛhṇātu /
V01bsu046_u:56_1: tena bhikṣuṇā so dūto evamasya vacanīyo na kho punarāyuṣman kṣamate bhikṣusya cīvare cetāpanāni pratigṛhṇītuṃ /
V01bsu046_u:56_2: cīvarantu vayaṃ pratigṛhṇāmaḥ kālena samayena kalpikaṃ dīyamānaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:56_3: evamukto so dūto taṃ bhikṣumeva vādayanti /
V01bsu046_u:56_5: ākāṃkṣāmaṇe na bhikṣuṇā santā vaiyāpṛtyaṃkaraṃ vyapadiśitavyāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:56_6: ārāmikā vā ete āyuṣman bhikṣuṇā vaiyāpṛtyaṃkarāye bhikṣuṇāṃ vaiyāpṛtyaṃ karonti /
V01bsu046_u:56_7_0: evamukto so dūto yena vaiyāpratyaṃkarāstenopasaṃkramitvā tanvaiyāpratyaṃkarānevaṃ
V01bsu046_u:56_7_1: vadeya sādhu kho puna yūyamāyuṣmanto vaiyāpratyaṃkarā ime hi cīvaracetāpane hi cīvaraṃ
V01bsu046_u:56_8_0: kālena samayena kalpikenānavadyena so ca dūto tānvaiyāpṛtyaṃkarān saṃjñāpayitvā yena
V01bsu046_u:56_8_1: so bhikṣustenopasaṃkramitvā bhikṣūmeva vadeya ye khalu āryeṇa vaiyāpṛtyaṃkarā vyapadiṣṭāste
V01bsu046_u:56_9: te cīvareṇa kālena samayena kalpikenānavadyo na ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā cīvarānvikena te vaiyāpṛtyakarāstenopasaṃkramitvā te vaiyāpṛtyaṃkarāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:56_11_0: atho āyuṣmanto bhikṣusya cīvareṇa bhisakṛta dvikkhutto trikkhutto codayanto vijñāpayanto
V01bsu046_u:56_11_2: ṣaḍkhutto paramantena bhikṣuṇā tūṣṇīṃ bhūtena uddeśe sthātavyaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:56_12_0: catukkhutto pañcakkhutto ṣaḍkkhatto paramaṃ tūṣṇībhūto uddeśe tiṣṭhanto taṃ cīvaramabhiniṣpādeya

V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.44_0: yo punabhikṣū bhikṣūmevaṃ vadeya ehi tvaṃ māyuṣmāngrāmaṃ pinḍāya praviśiṣyāmaḥ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.44_2: so tatra tasya kiñcidāpayitvā vā adāpayitvā vā paścādudyojanaṃ prakṣo evaṃ vadeya gaccha tvamāyuṣmanname tvayā sārdhaṃ phāsu bhavati kathāya vā niṣadyāya vā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.44_4: kathāya vā niṣadyāya vā etadeva pratyeyaṃ kṛtvā ananyamimantasya bhikṣusya udyojana pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.45_0: yo punabhikṣu bhikṣūnevaṃ vadeya tathāhamāyuṣmānto bhagavatā dharmmandeśitamājānāmi
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.45_1: yathā ye ime antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā tānpratisevato vā nālamantarāyāya /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.45_2: so bhikṣū bhikṣū hi evamasya vacanīyo mā āyuṣmannevamvada mā bhagavantam ācakṣa /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.45_3: asatā buddhyāhī tena antarāyikā evamāyuṣma ndharmāḥ samānā antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā alañca punastān pratisevato antarāyāya /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.45_4: evaṃ ca so bhikṣu bhikṣuhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ityetaṃ kuśalānno ca pratinissareya /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.45_5: so bhikṣu bhikṣuhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.45_6: pratinissagāya yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.45_7: pratinissareya ityetaṃ kuśalaṃ no ca pratiniḥsareya so bhikṣūḥ samagreṇa saṃghena
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.45_8: ukṣipitavyo imaṃ tasya bhikṣusya ukṣepaṇa pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.46_0: yo puna bhikṣurjānanbhikṣu tathā ukṣiptaṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmeṇa
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.46_1: vinayena yathāvādiṃ tathā kāritāṃ pāpikāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ apratinissaraṇaṃ taṃ akṛtānudharmmaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.46_2: sabhuṃjeya vā saṃvaseya vā sahagāraśayyāmvā kalpeya pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.47_0: śramaṇuddeśopi cedevaṃ vadeyaṃ ta thāhamāyuṣmānto bhagavatā dharmadeśitamājānāmi
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.47_1: yathā ye ime antarāyikā kāmā uktā bhagavatā tānpratisevato nālamantarāyāya so śramaṇuddeśo
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.47_2: bhikṣūhi evamasya vacanīyo mā āyuṣman śramaṇuddeśa evamvada mā bhagavantamasyācakṣa
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.47_4: samānā antarāyikāḥ kāmā uktā bhagavatā alaṃ ca punastānpratisevato antarāyāya /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.47_5: evañca so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣū hi vucyamāno taṃ vastu pratiniḥsareya ityetaṃ kuśalanno
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.47_6: ca pratinissareyasto śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.47_7: tasya vastusya pratiniḥssagāya yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.47_8: vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ityetaṃ kuśalanno ca pratiniḥsareyaḥ so śramaṇuddeśo
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.47_9: bhikṣū hi nāśayitavyo adyadagreṇa te āyuṣman śramaṇuddeśa na caiva so bhagavānastathāgato(?)rhansamyak
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.47_10: saṃbuddhe śāstāvyapadiśitavyo yaṃ pi ca dāni labhasi bhikṣūrhi sārdhaṃ dvirātraṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.47_11: vā trirātramvā sahagāraśayyāṃ sāyite adyadagreṇa nāsti gacchanasya cala prapalāhi /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.47_12: yo punabhikṣū jānantathārmaśitaṃ śramaṇuddeśaṃ yathāvādīntathā kāritāṃ pāpikāṃ dṛṣṭimapratiniḥsarantaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.47_13: akṛtānudharmma upasthāye vā upalāyeya vā saṃbhuṃjeya vā saṃvaseya vā sahagāraśayyāṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.48_1: nīlamvā kardamamvā kālaśyāmanvā tato ca bhikṣūranādāya navaṃ cīvaraparibhuṃjeya pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.49_0: yo punarbhikṣūranyatra adhyārāme vā adhyāvasathe vā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.49_1: ratanamvā ratanasaṃmatamvā udgṛhṇāya vā udgṛhṇāyeya vā pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.49_3: adhyārāme vā adhyāvasathe vā udgṛhṇītavyaṃ vā udgṛhṇāyayitavyaṃ vā yasya bhaviṣyati so hariṣyatīti etadevapratyayaṃ kṛtvā ananyamiyamatrasāmīcī /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.50_1: tatrāyaṃ samayo dvyarddho māso śeṣe grīṣmāṇāmvarṣāṇāṃ ca purimo māso ityete ardhātīya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.50_2: māsaḥ paridāhakālasamayo adhvānagamanakālasamayo gilānasamayo karmasamayo vātasamayo
V01bsu046_u:141_0: udyānam // [41] kṣobhiḥ [42] sahagāra [43] cchandam [44] udyojanā [45-46-47] trayo'ntarāyikā [48] akṛtakalpam [49] ratanaṃ [50] snānena /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.51: yo punabhikṣu jānia prāṇakamudakaṃ paribhuṃjeya pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.52: yo punabhikṣū avelaka sya vā avelikāya vā parivrājakasya vā parivrājakāye vā svahastaṃ khādanīyamvā bhojanīyamvā dadyātpācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.53: yo punabhikṣū jānantaṃ bhojanīye kule anupakhajjāsane niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.54: yo punabhikṣu jania bhojanīye kule praticchannāsane niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.55: yo punabhikṣurudyaktāṃ se nāmdarśanāya gaccheya pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.56: syāttasya bhikṣusya kvacideva pratyayosanāyāṅgamanāya dvi[rā] tramvā trirātramvā tena bhikṣuṇāsenāyāṃ vasitavyaṃ taducarīṃ vaseya pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.57: tatrāpi ca bhikṣu dvirātramvā trirātramvā senāyāṃ vasamāno āyūhikamvā niyūhikaṃmvā aneka vyūhamvā dhvajāmvā śīrṣamvā darśanāya gaccheya pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.60: yo punarbhikṣu jānan bhikṣūsya dusthūlāmāpattiṃ kṛtamavyācīṇṇāṃ cchādeya so na pareṣāmāroceya kinti semāpare jānanneti avadya praticchādane pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.61: yo punabhikṣu saṃcintya tiryagyonigataṃ prāṇinaṃ jīvitād vyaparopeya pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.62: yo punabhikṣu bhikṣusya saṃcintya kaukṛtyamupasaṃhareya kintisa muhūrttampi aphāsu bhavediti pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.63_0: yo punarbhikṣū bhikṣūsya vā bhikṣuṇīye vā śrāmaṇerasye vā śrāmaṇerīye
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.63_1: vā śikṣamāṇāye vā cīvaramdatvā apratyuddhareya paribhuṃjeya apratyuddhāraparibhoge pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.64: yo punarbhikṣū bhikṣūsya pātriṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā niṣīdanaṃ vā sūcīvigrahamvā apaniheyamvā apanihāyeya vā antamasato hāsyāñcāpi pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.68: yo punabhikṣū mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ saṃvidhāya adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyet antamasato grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.69: yo punarbhikṣū mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ sahagāraśayyāṃ kalpeya pācattikam //
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.70: yo punarbhikṣū mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ eko ekāyaraho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikam //
V01bsu046_u:163_0: udyānam / [61] saṃcintya [62] kaukṛtya [63] mapratyuddharitya [64] kāpaniheya [65] bhiṣeya [66] udake [67] aṃgulī [68] saṃvidhāya [69] sahagāra [70] niṣadyāya /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.71: yo punarbhikṣū jānantaṃ unaviṃśativarṣaṃ pudgalaṃ bhikṣu upasaṃpādeya so ca pudgalo anupasaṃpanno te ca bhikṣū gārhyāṃ imaṃstathā bhikṣuṇāgarhaṇaṃ pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.72: yo punarbhikṣū jānanstainyasārdhena sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamasato grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.73: yo punarbhikṣū svahastapṛthvīm khaneya vā khanāyeya vā antamasato iha khanehīti evaṃ vadeya pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.74: cāturmāsikaṃ bhikṣuṇā pratyeka pravāraṇā sādayitavyā taduttariṃ sādiyeya anyatra punaḥ pravāraṇāye anyatra yāvajjīvikāye pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.75_0: yo punarbhikṣū bhikṣū hi evaṃ vucyamāno ime hi te āyuṣman pañca hi āpattikāye anadhyāvācāya śikṣā karaṇīyeti /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.75_1: so bhikṣū tāṃ bhikṣunevaṃ vadeya na yāvadahamāyuṣmantānāṃ vacanena śikṣiṣyaṃ yāvadahaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.75_2: na drakṣyāmi svavirānbhikṣūn sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkādharān madhyamānbhikṣūn
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.75_3: sūtradharānvinayadharān mātṛkādharān navakānbhikṣū sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkādharānnatāṃstāvadahamupasaṃkramya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.78_0: yo punarbhikṣū bhikṣū hi kalahajāte hi bhanḍana jāte hi vigrahavivādāpanne
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.78_1: hi viharante hi upaśrotrasthāne tiṣṭheya yaṃ ete vadiṣyanti taṃ śrutvā upasaṃhariṣyāmīti /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.78_2: etadeva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā ananyamimantasya bhikṣūsya upaśrotrasthāne pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.79: yo punabhikṣūḥ saṃghe viniścayakathā hi varttamānā hi utthāyāsanātprakrameya santaṃ bhikṣūmanāmantrayitvā anyatra tathārūpe atyāyike karaṇīye pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.80: yo punabhikṣū āraṇyake śayyāsane viharanto vikāle grāmaṃ praviśeya santaṃ bhikṣūmanāmantrayitvā anyatra tathārūpe atyāyike karaṇīye pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:174_0: uddānaṃ // [71] ūnaviṃśati [72] stainyasārdhaṃ [73] pṛthivī [74] pravāraṇā [75] na śikṣiṣyaṃ [76] madyapāna [77] manādaryaṃ [78] mupaśrotra [79] viniścaya [80] āraṇyakena /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.81_0: yo puna bhikṣū sabhakto samāno pūve bhaktaṃ paścādbhaktaṃ vā kuleṣu cāritramāpadyeya santaṃ bhikṣumanāmantrayitvā anyatra samaye pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.82_0: yo punabhikṣū rājñāḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhā abhiṣiktasya janapadasthāmavīryaprāprasya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.82_1: antaḥpuraṃ praviśeyāniṣkrānte rājāne aniṣkrānte antaḥpure aniggate hi ratane hi antamasato
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.83: yo punabhikṣū dantamayamvā asthimayamvā śṛṅgamayamvā suvaṇṇamayamvā rūpyamayamvā ratanamayamvā sūcīvigrahaṃ kārāpeya bhedana pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.84_0: mañcamvā pīṭhamvā bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena sugatāṣṭāṅgulapramāṇāḥ pādakāḥ kārāpayitavyāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.85: yo punabhikṣū tūla saṃstṛte maṃce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhipadyeya vā uddāla na pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.86_1: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ dīrghaśo dve vitastīyo sugatavitastinā tiryag rddhamanyatra daśavitasti kaṃ taduttariṃ kārāpeya cchedana pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.87_1: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ dīrghaśo catvāri vitastīyo sugatavitastinā tiryagdve taduttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.88_0: varṣāśāṣṭikā bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena prāmāṇikā kārāpayitavyā tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ dīrghaśo ṣaḍvitastīyo sugatavitastinā tiryag rddhatīyaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.89_0: yo punabhikṣū sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeya kiñcitasya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.89_1: bhagavate tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyak saṃbuddhasya sugatasya sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ dirghaśo
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.89_2: nava vitastīyo sugatavitastinā tiryaka ṣaḍ idantasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.89_3: samyak saṃbuddhasya sugatasya sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ tato vā punaruttariṃ kārāpeya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.90: yo punabhikṣū bhikṣūsya dusto doṣānkupito anāttano amulakena saṃghātiśeṣeṇa dharmmeṇānudhvaṃseya pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.91: yo punabhikṣū jānan sāṃdhikaṃ lābhaṃ saṃghe pariṇataṃ pudgalo pudgalasya pariṇāmeya pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.92_0: yo punabhikṣūranvarddhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddiśyamāne evaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.92_1: vadeya adya punarahaṃ jānāmi idānīṃ punarahaṃ jānāmi ayampi dharmo sūtrāgato sūtraparyāpanno
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.92_2: anvarddhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśamāgacchati yāvadahannajānāmi tāvannāstīthaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.92_3: makṣamāpattirjānea ca te bhikṣū taṃ bhikṣūm sakṛtdvitthikkhutto trikkhutto āgatapūrvvaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.92_4: pi sannidhapūrvvaṃ pi kaḥ punarvvādo bahuśo nāsti kho punastasya bhikṣūsya ajñānena
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.92_6: atha iyāṃpi ca so bhikṣūrāpattimāpanno tu kṣiprameva yathādharmmaṃ yathāvinayaṃ kārāpayitavyo
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.92_7: uttariṃ saṃmohamāpādayitavyo tasya te āyuṣman lābhādurlabdhāyastvaṃ anvarddhamāsaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.92_8: sūtre pratimokṣo uddiśyamānenāsthīkṛtvā na manasi kṛtvā na sarvvacetasā samanvāhṛtya
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pac.92_9: avahitaśroto sankṛtya dharmaśṛṇoṣīti imantasya bhikṣūsya sammohanayā pācattikam /
V01bsu046_u:188_0_0: uddānam // [81] sabhakto [82] rājño [83] sūcīgṛhaṃ [84] mañca [85] tūla [86] niṣīdanaṃ
V01bsu046_u:189_0: vaggāṇāmuddānaṃ [1] mṛṣā [2] bījaṃ [3] asammato [4] ekāhaparamo [5] kṣobhi [6] saprāṇakaṃ [7] sañcintya [8] unaviṃśati [9] sabhaktakena /
V01bsu046_u:190_0: kho punarāyuṣmanto dvānavati śuddhapācattikā dharmmāstatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhā dvitīyampi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:190_1: tṛtīyampi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāttūṣṇīṃ mevametandhārayāmi /
V01bsu046_u:192_0: ime kho punarāyuṣmanto catvāraḥ pātideśanikā dharmā anvarddhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśamāgacchanti /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.1_0: yo punabhikṣu āraṇyake śayanāsane viharanto pūrvve apratisamveditaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.1_1: vahidvā apratigṛhītamantevāsa vastusminnagilāno svahastaṃ khādanīyamvā bhojanīyamvā
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.1_2: pratigṛhṇitvā khādeya vā bhuñjeya vā bhuktāvinā tena bhikṣuṇā pratideśayitavyaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.1_3: asaṃpreyamme āyuṣman gārhyamprātideśanikaṃ dharmmamāpanno taṃ dharmapratideśayāmi ayaṃ dharmmo prātideśaniko /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.2_0: yo punabhikṣuranyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye antaragṛhaṃ praviṣtāye agilāno
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.2_1: svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyamvā pratigṛhṇitvā khāde ya vā bhuñjeya vā bhuktā
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.2_3: asaṃpreyamme āyuṣman gārhyampratideśanikaṃ dharmmamāpanno taṃ dharmmaṃ pratideśayāmi /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.3_0: bhikṣu kho punarantaragṛhe nimantritakānmuñjanti tatra ca bhikṣuṇī
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.3_1: viśvāsamānarūpāsthitā bhavati so evamāha iha odanaṃ dehi iha sūpaṃ dehi iha vyañjanaṃ
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.3_2: dehīti vadeya sarvehi te bhikṣū hi sā bhikṣūṇī evamasya vacanīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.3_3: āgamaya tāvattvaṃ bhagini yāvadbhikṣū bhuñjantīti ekabhikṣū pi ca tāṃ bhikṣuṇīnnevaṃ vadeya /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.3_4: āgamaya tāvattvaṃ bhagini yāvadbhikṣū bhuñjantīti bhuktāvīhi te hi bhikṣu hi pratideśayitavyaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.3_5: asaṃpreyamme āyuṣman gārhyampratideśanikaṃ dharmamāpanno taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmi /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.4_0: yāni kho punarimāni śikṣasammatā ni kulāni bhavanti /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.4_1: tatra ca bhikṣūḥ pūrvve apravārito upasaṃkramitvā svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇitvā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā bhuktāvinā tena bhikṣuṇā pratideśayitavyaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_pratid.4_2: asaṃpreyamme āyuṣman gārhyaṃ pratideśanikaṃ dharmamāpanno taṃ dharmaṃ pratideśayāmi /
V01bsu046_u:197_0: uddānam // [1] āraṇyaka [2] mantaragṛhe [3] bhikṣū ca nimantritakāḥ [4] śaikṣasammatena catvāraḥ uddiṣṭāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:198_0: kho punarāyuṣmanto catvāraḥ prātideśanikā dharmāstatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:198_1: dvitīyampi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ tṛtīyampi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ pariśuddhāḥ atrāyuṣmanto yasmāttūṣṇīmevametaṃ dhārayāmi /
V01bsu046_u:200_0: ime kho punarāyuṣmano sātireka pañcāṣaḍ śikṣādharmmā anvarddhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśamāga cchanti /
V01bsu046_u:202_0_0: uddānam [1] nivasanaṃ [2] prāvaraṇaṃ [3] susaṃvṛto [4] cakṣūḥ [5] śabda [6] nojhaggīkā
V01bsu046_u:202_0_1: [7] na oguṇṭhikā [8] nokṣiptikā [9] na ukkuṭṭikā [10] na khambha [11] na kāya [12]
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.21: na pallatthikāya antaragṛhe niṣī diṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.22: na khambhakṛto antaragṛhe niṣīdiśyāmīti śi[kṣā] karaṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.23: na antaragṛhe niṣaṇṇo hastaṃ kokṛtyamvā pādakaukṛtyamvā kariṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:204_0: uddānaṃ // [14] susaṃvṛto [15] cakṣuḥ [16] śabda [17] nojhaggikā [18] na oguṇṭhikā [19] nokṣiptikā [20] nośaktikā [21] na pallatthikā [22] na khambha [23] na hastapādakaukṛtyena /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.29: na jihvā nicārakaṃ piṇḍapātraṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.30: nāti mahamte hi kavaḍe hi piṇḍapātraṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.34: na sakavaḍena mukhena vāca bhāṣiṣyamīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:206_0_0: uddānaṃ // [24] satkṛtya [25] samasūpa [26] na sūpa [27] nāvakīṇṇa [28] nāvaganḍa
V01bsu046_u:206_0_1: [29] na jihvā [30] nātimahāntaṃ [31] nānāgataṃ [32] na kavaḍotkṣepaka [33] na kavaḍacchedaka
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.35: na pātraṃ nirllehakaṃ piṇḍapātraṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.45: na agilāno odanamvā sūpamvā vyañjanamvā ātmātvāya kule hi vijñāpetvā vā vijñāpāyetvā vā piṇḍapātraṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.48: na saśitthena pāṇinā pānīyasthālakaṃ pratigṛhṇiṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:208_0_0: uddānam / [35-36-37] trayo nirllehāḥ / [28] cucu [39] surusuru [40] na śuluśulu [41]
V01bsu046_u:208_0_1: na hasta [42] na sittha [43] na odhyāyana [44] pātrasaṃjñī [45] rvijñapti [46] cchādayati
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.49: na thito niṣaṇṇasya agilānasya dharmmandeśayiṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.50: na niṣaṇṇo niṣadyasya agilānasya dharmandeśayiṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.51: na nīcāsane niṣaṇṇo uccāsane niṣaṇṇo agilānasya dharmandeśayiṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.57: na pallatthikāya niṣaṇṇasya agilāna sya dharmandeśayiṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:210_0: uddānam // [49] na thito [50] na niṣaṇṇo [51] uccāsana [52] upānaha [53] pādukā [54] oguṇṭhikā [55] na sanmukha [56] na osattikā [57] na pallatthikāya /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.62: na utpathena gacchanto pathena gacchantasya agilānasya dharmandeśayiṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.63: na pṛṣṭhato gacchanto purato gacchantasya agilānasya dharmandeśayiṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.64: na pādena gacchanto yānena gacchantasya agilānasya dharmandeśayiṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.65: na harite tṛṇe ucchāraṃ vā praśrāvaṃ vā kheḍḍaṃ vāsiṃhāṇaṃ vā agilāno kariṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.66: na udake uccāraṃ vā praśrāvaṃ vā kheḍḍaṃ vā siṃhāṇakaṃ vā agilāno kariṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:prmosu_ma_sai.67: na sthito uccāramvā praśrāvamvā agilāno kariṣyāmīti śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:212_0: uddānam // [58-59] na śastrāyudha [60] daṇḍa [61] cchatra [62] utpatha [63] pṛṣṭhato [64] yānaṃ [65] haritaṃ[66] udaka [67] sthitena /
V01bsu046_u:214_0: VIII. THE SEVEN ADHIKARANA SAMATHA DHARMAS.
V01bsu046_u:215_0: ime kho punarāyuṣmanto sapta adhikaraṇasamathādharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśamāgacchanti /
V01bsu046_u:217_0: uddiṣtāḥ kho punarāyuṣmanto sapta adhikaraṇasamathādharmā sūtrā yuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:217_1: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:217_2: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:218_1: dharmo anudharmaśu anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśamāgacchanti /
V01bsu046_u:219_0: tatra dharmo nāma yamubhayato vinayo / anudharmo nāma yā atra pratipattiḥ //
V01bsu046_u:220_1: dharmo anudharmaśu tetrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:220_2: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ tṛtīyampi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:221_9_0: uddiṣtā duve dharmāḥ / dharmo anudharmaśu / etakoyaṃ punastasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ
V01bsu046_u:221_9_1: samyak saṃbuddhasya dharmavinayo prātimokṣasūtrāgato sūtraparyāpanno yo vā anyopi
V01bsu046_u:221_9_2: kaściddharmasya anudharmo tatra samagre hi sarvve hi sahite hi saṃmodamāne hi avivadamāne
V01bsu046_u:221_9_3: hi ekoddeśe hi kṣīrodakī kṛtehi śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāne hi /
V01bsu046_u:221_10: sukhañca phāsuñca viharante hi anadhyāvācāya śikṣākaraṇīyā /
V01bsu046_u:222_0: kṣāntiḥ paramantapo titikṣā nirvvāṇaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhāḥ /
V01bsu046_u:222_1: nahi pravrajitaḥ paropaghātī śravaṇo bhoti parānviheṭhayantaḥ /
V01bsu046_u:223_0: idamtasya bhagavato vipaścitasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasva acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam /
V01bsu046_u:224_0: āropavādī aparopaghātī pratimokṣe ca samvare mātrajñatā ca /
V01bsu046_u:224_1: bhuktismiṃ prāntañca śayanāsanaṃ adhicitte cāyogo etaṃ buddhānuśāsanaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:225_0: idaṃ tasya bhagavato śaikṣisya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam /
V01bsu046_u:226_1: śokāḥ na bhavanti tāyino upaśāntasya sadāsmṛtīmataḥ //
V01bsu046_u:227_0: idaṃ tasya bhagavate viśvabhuvasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyak saṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena pratimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:229_0: idantasya bhagavato krukrucchandasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyak saṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena pratimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ /
V01bsu046_u:231_0: na pareṣāṃ vilomāni na pareṣāṃ kṛtākṛtam /
V01bsu046_u:232_0: idantasya bhagavato konākamunisya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena pratimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam /
V01bsu046_u:233_1: yasya dhyānañca prajñā ca sa vai nirvāṇasya antike //
V01bsu046_u:234_0: tatrāyamādi bhavati / iha prajñasya bhikṣuṇo indriyaiguptiḥ saṃjñaptiḥ prātimokṣe ca saṃvaro //
V01bsu046_u:236_0: idaṃ tasya bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam /
V01bsu046_u:237_0: cakṣuṣā saṃvaraḥ sādhuḥ sādhuḥ śrotreṇa saṃvaraḥ /
V01bsu046_u:237_2: kāyena saṃvaraḥ sādhu manasā sādhu saṃvaraḥ /
V01bsu046_u:238_0: idantasya bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ śākyādhirājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyak sambuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena pratimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam /
V01bsu046_u:240_0: [1] vipaśvī ānāyavadyañca [2] śikhī prakāśayati adhicittañca [3] viśvabhuḥ /
V01bsu046_u:240_2: duryāñca [5] konākamuniḥ / [6] dhyānāni ca kāśyapo prakāśayati [7] saṃvaraṃ śākyamuneḥ /
V01bsu046_u:240_3: ete saptadaśabalā / mahāprajñā amitabuddhī saptānāṃ samyak saṃbuddhānāṃ.
V01bsu046_u:240_5: uddistaṃ prātimokṣasūtraṃ / kṛtaṃ saṃghena yo ca dha....āryāḥ....pālayantu / samāptaṃ / prātimokṣasūtraṃ āryamahāsāṃghikānāṃ lokottaravādināṃ mādhyāddeśikānāṃ pāṭhi.
V01bsu046_u:240_6: ... / ye dharmahetuprabhavā taṃ pi tathāgato avadatteṣāñca yonirodhaṃ evaṃ vādī mahāśravaṇaḥ /
V01bsu046_u:240_7: ye dharmmo yaṃ pravaramahāyāna payiśya śākyabhikṣuloka .
